title: Buoys
lyrics:
It comes to me
Plain to see
Not only me
Nowhere to be
I got a ride



Go leave it on the ground

And throw a bone



Not on my own

I got a zone

I got a ride



Lift this sick old leg

Farr from the other leg

Lick this sick instinct

Drip from a constant heart ache



And leave it on the ground

Until it's down



My mind is blown

Itâ€™s coming home

It's in my eyes



And when it makes a sound

The coast is clear



Not on my own

I got a zone

I got a ride



Lit from a light within

Made from a brittle thing

We got a special thing

Stuck between a rock and a hard place



Go leave it on the ground

Go go go go
